text: The following article is a list of lighthouses in Cape Verde. Cape Verde has tens of lighthouses scattered across its nine major islands. The lighthouses are administered by the Direction of Marine and Ports (Direcção Geral de Marinha e Portos) or DGMP.DGMP ==Boa Vista== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%" |- ! Name !!
